commit message:
Merge tag '1.0.33' into develop

1.0.33
ConferenceAdd and ConferenceSelectActivity: keyboard do not opened by default.
ConferenceAddFragment: chat window opened after conference join.
conferences_filter: 'done' keyboard action used for input field.

Merge branch 'develop' into feature/smack

Conflicts:
app/src/main/AndroidManifest.xml
app/src/main/java/com/xabber/android/data/extension/muc/MUCManager.java
app/src/main/java/com/xabber/android/ui/ConferenceAddFragment.java

VCardManager rewritten to use Smack methods to get vCards.
Unused code from xmpp/vcard removed.
VCardManager: catch for ClassCastException added - some servers return incorrect answers for vCard request. This is just rude fix.
smack_config.xml: packetReplyTimeout increased to 30000 milliseconds - to allow load several avatars for example.
ContactVcardViewerFragment: progress bar added.
New AccountViewer with menu option item to edit account user info (vCard).
New activity and fragment AccountInfoEditor and AccountInfoEditorFragment. First implementation of vCard editing.
Version 1.0.34 (code 207)
VCard editing improved. More fields. Save button. New OnVCardSaveListener interface.
Version 1.0.35 (code 208)
Forgotten icon resources added.
VCardManager: empty vCard receiving fixed.
Account vCard editing: after vCard update, AccountInfoEditor requests updated vCard and passes it back to AccountViewer. AccountViewer updates view to show vCard changes.
AccountInfoEditorFragment: input controls disabled while vCard saving.
First implementation of avatar select using jdamcd/android-crop library.
Version 1.0.36 (code 209)
AccountInfoEditorFragment: avatar selection improved. Image size is shown.
AccountInfoEditor: simple toolbar with title used instead of ContactTitleActionBarInflater.
AccountInfoEditor: toolbar changed during vCard saving - title changed and menu option disabled.
AccountInfoEditor: avatar max size set to 192 - it will be resized automatically.
AccountInfoEditor: avatar can be taken from camera. avatar can be removed.
Version 1.0.37 (code 210)
AccountInfoEditorFragment: birth date selected via DatePicker dialog.
AccountInfoEditorFragment: avatar removing fixed - avatar would no be removed if unchanged.
VCardManager: vcard requests are saved to show 'progress mode' for AccountInfoEditorFragment if case of rotation, pause etc.

AccountInfoEditorFragment: birth date 'Change' button removed, click on text view used. Added button to remove birthdate.
drawer_touch renamed to ripple_background.
account_info_editor_fragment: icon for avatar changed.
ContactTitleExpandableToolbarInflater: contact info updated every resume.
ContactTitleInflater: account avatar fixed.
Merge branch 'feature/smack' into develop
Czech translation added. Spanish, French, Hungarian, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese,  Portuguese Brazilian, Russian and Slovak translations updated.
Version 1.0.38 (code 211)
Merge branch 'release/1.0.38'
